MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-NOV-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn, affecting properties in Pendre Avenue and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:24 AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:56 AM on 13th November 2020.
